Increases life points by 30 and increases fire assaults by 5.
Forces the dinoz to use their most powerful A-skill on the next turn.
When hunting, this skill allows the dinoz to hunt once more.
Increases the chances of a multi-hit combo by 30%.
Either increases speed by 25% or reduces it by 25% at the start of a battle.
Increases defence against wood by 20.
Revives the dinoz with 1HP during the battle, increses initiative and speed by 10 but the dinoz cannot heal.

Reduces the dinoz' endurance by 15%.
Automatically protects the dinoz with fewest life points for the duration of the combat.
Attacks in WOOD with power 10, a rock is projected at the enemy at mesmerising speed.
Reduces an enemy dinoz endurance by 30% during an assault.
Increases HP by 50.

Allows a dinoz to search once more when scavenging.
Increases WATER defence by 20 and increases WOOD assaults by 20.
Increases initiative by 20.
Doubles assault power, but bans the dinoz from using E and A skills.
Absorbs up to 30 damage points before vanishing. Is vulnerable to the Kaar-Sher Beam.
Increases HP by 100.
Copies a skill which has already been used by an enemy dinoz and keeps it until the end of the combat.
Allows a dinoz to cancel an enemy's A and E sphere skills in WATER.

Doubles the number of HP restored by the dinoz when resting.

Gives an enemy MonoElement status, restricting them to using a single element.

Whilst fishing, this allows the dinoz to fish once more.
Cancels all of an enemy's equipped objects except magic items.
Stops the selected enemy from summoning their deity.

Increases water assaults by 20.
Decreases the endurance of all enemy dinoz by 20%.

Increases HP by 80.

Increases a dinoz' endurance by 10%.

Dazzles an enemy dinoz, causing them to miss their target one time in three.

Increases health points by 50 but reduces initiative by 15.
